articles.title: From Dr. Oz to heart valves: A tiny device charted a contentious path through the FDA - CBS News
articles.description: The story of MitraClip, a device Dr. Oz helped invent to treat faulty heart valves, is a cautionary tale about the science, business and regulation of medical technology.
